It's simple what's going on. A recent report on one of those evening Hollywood entertainment shows found a gambling ring using telephone voting rigging system set up to vote for whichever candidate they were betting on. 
 
 The voting is set up unsecurely, allowing anyone to call as often as they wish. All it would take is for people to get their hands on a "war dialer" computerized phone system and program it to call a certain number and hang up a specified number of seconds after it answers. When you call one of the American Idol numbers to vote, you get a recording saying "thank you for voting for contestant #_. Please watch tomorrow for the final blah-blah-blah."
 
 There are apparently only a certain number of answering lines for each contestant. Now think about this: if you listen to the recording all the way through before hanging up, you are hogging the line that extra number of seconds which prevent someone else from calling in - and casting another vote for that candidate. So, if you really want your desired candidate to win, you should hang up before the recording finishes to free the line.
 
 If you were one of the riggers with a 'war dialer' system, you would program the computer to call the number, and upon answering, hang up right away. The quicker it hangs up, the quicker the line is free to get another vote in.
 
 It's very simple. All it takes is some simple thinking it through and anyone can logically conclude all this.
